Articles.Content: Is there any way to change key bindings for wheels. I want to be able to drive forward without having the fake rolling effect the pods have or winglets tip me over. I want to bind accelerate to up on the numpad and brake to 5 on the num or something like that. Thanks.
Hi polimerjones, you can go to the option, control and then on the rover tab to do so.

Another option without changing key bindings is going into docking mode. You can do this by klicking the button in the lower left corner of your HUD.

Or, since it is possible in .21, simply assign all reaction wheels to an action group and deactivate them once you have landed your rover.
